import React from 'react'
import styled from "styled-components";



const Container=styled.div`
`
const Image=styled.img`

`


const CategoryItem = ({item}) => {
    return (
        <Container>
            <Image src={item.img}/>
            <Info>
                <Title> {item.title} </Title>
            </Info>
        </Container>
    )
}

export default CategoryItem
